## [twin-width](../VipBQc) â†’ [radius-r flip-width](../nMKJBg)
* [Torunczyk2023](../KpkMZB): Theorem 7.1. Fix $r \in \mathbb N$. For every graph $G$ of twin-width $d$ we have: $\mathrm{fw}_r(G) \le 2^d \cdot d^{O(r)}.$
